resources.string: 1. Write the name of the person you like on paper.
2. Wrap a piece of chocolate with the paper.
3. Then repeat 5 times: "The Magic of Chocolate our love will unite."
4. Provides chocolate to the person you want to love.
This spell should be done with full moon.
2. Next, covers the flowers with honey.
3. Put the glass near the bed.
4. Repeat several times: "Grant me moon powerful love this tie"
You"\u0027"ll see that in a few days you will notice the results of the spell.
1. Between the pages of the book put flower petals.
2. Close the book and keep them under your bed until the next full moon.
3 Remove the petals from the book and put them in a bag.
4. Hide the bag with petals and your love will be eternal.
1. Night put in a glass with salt water.
2. Stir the mixture while saying:"\n" "dark night, he confided that star power does not break our love and be infinite as heaven"
1. Before sleeping write on paper the name of the person you wish to call.
2. Draw a heart around the name.
3. Fold the paper put it near the phone.
I promise to call you soon.
1. Put a flower in a glass and a few drops of your favorite perfume.
2. Put some water in the glass with the perfume. Then stir the mixture.
3. Put a few drops of this perfume of love.
This fragrance will romance your love and your love will remain united.
2. Save the seeds in a box and repeat. "Love is the greatest seed"
3. Hide the box where no one can find.
This spell is the most effective
1. Write the name of the person you want on paper.
2. Put sugar on paper and fold.
3. Put the paper in the bottle.
4. Repeat these words:"\n" "Sweeten your feelings and think of me. I want your love. "
You"\u0027"ll see how soon get a couple.
1. On paper write the name of the person you want to forget.
2. Roll up the paper and tied the rope around.
3. Repeat:"\n" "As you you left, my love for you is anger and my mind will disappear"
4. Place the paper in the freezer and forget that old love achieved it.
1. Write the name of the person you like on paper
2. Draw a heart around the name sugar
3. Fold the paper and repeat:"\n" "As sweet as sugar, our love nothing nothing bitter
4. Save the paper where no one can find, for the spell is not broken.
1. flaked cookies and mix with equal parts milk and cocoa
2. Make a thick mass in the form of a ball
3. Offer to the mass and the beam which as whole.
4. To work the spell you have to sleep listening to the favorite song of the person you want to love.
This spell only works on February 14 the day of Saint Valentine
1. Write the name of the person you like
2. Wrap the paper into candies and keep under your pillow
3. Repeat the following phrase:"\n" "Candy sweet symbols of love, this person will feel undying love for me.
You believe in magic share our app Real love spells for your spells to be effective
